div.p: Do you think it is more important to have an enjoyable job or to make money? Explain your point of view.
In my view, both having an enjoyable job and making money are important.
On the one hand, you need to have a job you like because otherwise you won't work with pleasure and feel happy to go to your workplace or even try to do your best to make a good job.
But, on the other hand, if you are not well paid or paid enough for the work you do, you will feel disapointed and you won't be happy neither.
Those are the reasons why I really tend to think that both having a job you like and being well paid are both important !
